idea:
The Company (iAcuity) is in the business of developing creative software which can assist the Auditors, Law Enforcement Agencies, Banks, Income Tax officers to investigate NPAs, investigate Financial Crime, Prevent Tax evasion and for Investors to perform Due Diligence / forensic audit for investment decisions.


iAcuity channelizes years of promoter’s experience combined with the research, innovation and expertise to design domain specific solutions that effectively collate, filter, curate, analyse the relevant information from the large database and present the findings in a simple format for end user. The solutions being developed using proprietary algorithms aim to save the analyst time by automating the process from months to few hours. Further the software will ensure accuracy, consistency, reliable actionable intelligence with all the trails and back up document to support the analysis is available at the click of the button.


iAcuity aims to be a leading provider of end-to-end Proactive Intelligence and Analytics solutions that empower Government Agencies (Lawful Enforcement Agencies like EOW, ACB, CBI, Income Tax Investigation, Revenue Authorities…), Chartered Accountants, Forensic Auditors, Insolvency Professionals, Recovery Agencies, Banks and Enterprises (“Clients”) to make smarter and informed decisions.
name: IACUITY FINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
